item.description:
MBTA-Take #240 Crawford Sq. bus from Ashmont Station, Red Line, to "Randolph Ave and Chickataubut Rd"
Website- http://www.mass.gov/d...

Map-http://www.mass.gov/d...
Skill Level-Moderate


I'm really psyched to check out the Blue Hills. I've read a lot of great things about the area.
There is a parking lot next to the bus stop, which is on the corner of Randolph Ave and Chickataubut Rd. Let's meet there, at the trail entrance at 9:30AM.

The #240 Bus leaves Ashmont every half hour until 7:30PM, when it becomes hourly. Same for the return trip. I'll be on the 9AM bus heading in, and ready to go back to the city around 5-6PM.
Please let me know if you also depend on the T, we can meet-up at Ashmont.
This will be a leisurely, relaxed, uphill, hike. I'll likely want to stop for pictures every ten minutes!

We should check out the Braintree Pass Path, following the red trail to the top of Chickatawbut Hill. Then we could head west on the Skyline Trail for a bit. There will be plenty of side trails or we could aim for The Great Blue Hill!
See you soon!
item.name: MBTA Hike-Blue Hills
